trans-unit.source: Represents a hierarchical collection that can be enumerated with an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 接口枚举的分层集合。

trans-unit.source: Collections that implement the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface are used by ASP.NET site navigation and data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> 接口的集合供 ASP.NET 站点导航控件和数据源控件使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> interface extends the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface and exposes <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>, which is a method used to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object from an enumerated item, in addition to the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>接口扩展<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口并公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>，这是用于检索一方法<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象的枚举项，请从除了<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, clients that use <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> collections retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object by calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method, then iterate through the enumeration and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> on each enumerated item to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，客户端使用<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>集合检索<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>对象通过调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法，然后循环访问的枚举和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>上每个要检索的枚举项<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> interface with a class that extends <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> and provides a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> objects that wrap <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>具有扩展的类的接口<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，并提供了一套<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象包装<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> collection is used by classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> to return a collection of hierarchical nodes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>派生自的类使用集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>返回集合的分层节点时<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> for which to return an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData" />.
Returns a hierarchical data item for the specified enumerated item.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定枚举项的分层数据项。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData" /> instance that represents the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData" /> 实例，表示传递给 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData(System.Object)" /> 方法的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, clients that use <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> collections retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object by calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method, then iterate through the enumeration and call the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> method on each enumerated item to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，客户端使用<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>集合检索<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>对象通过调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法，然后循环访问的枚举和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>方法来检索每个枚举项<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how an ASP.NET hierarchical data-bound control uses an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object in a recursive data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 分层数据绑定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>递归数据绑定方法中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> object are enumerated, and for each an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object is retrieved using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>对象进行枚举，每个<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象使用检索<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.HasChildren%2A> property is checked to determine whether recursion is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.HasChildren%2A>属性进行检查以确定是否需要递归。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类。
